name: Dungeon Attack: Pain of Killings
description:
It will be a long way to kill all monsters & bosses.

Became stronger, kill monsters, increase level, equip items and defeat all.
This game now in alpha, but most features are done :)

craft & skills now in progress.

Alpha version: 1.0.0

Alpha version: 1.2

P.S. I am a huge fun of games like: wow, lineage 2, aion. That's why the main accent in a game on grinding, enchanting & crafting.
